name: whoami
description: === Whoami === Contributors: Saief Al Emon Requires at least: 6.0 Tested up to: 6.3.1 Requires PHP: 5.7 License: GPLv2 or later License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ~/Downloads/whoami.zip --exclude .DS_Store .ds_store .keep mix-manifest.json .eslintrc.json .eslintignore .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore phpcs.xml README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules package-lock.json package.json webpack.mix.js sass reactjs src
